Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:33:28
Folder: C1H1CQI - orders theft from vehicle
Message Count: 6

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1H1CQI_00
From: Vincent D'Cunha <Vincent.DCunha@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Jerome Curtis <Jerome.Curtis@chalhoub.com>; Ahmed Hamdy <Ahmed.Hamdy@chalhoub.com>; Neebal Natout <Neebal.Natout@chalhoub.com>; Hybrid Customer Care <hybridcustomercare@chalhoub.com>; HC - LastMileKwt Support <HC-LastMileKwtSupport@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-31 12:58
Subject: Orders theft from vehicle
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop

 

Hope you are doing well.

 

Further to our conversation on Teams, please find attached details of the missing 4 orders. As reported by the delivery Captain, the incident of theft has most likely occurred in the Al Rai Kuwait area between 3 PM and 3:45 PM on 29th March 2025, where he parked the vehicle in a crowded area, specifically at the Kuwait Friday market, to deliver an order to a customer.

Further to our conversation on Teams, please find attached details of the missing 4 orders. As reported by the delivery Captain, the incident of theft has most likely occurred in the Al Rai Kuwait area between 3 PM and 3:45 PM on 29th March 2025, where he parked the vehicle in a crowded area, specifically at the Kuwait Friday market, to deliver an order to a customer.

 

During his next stop, he noticed that four orders were missing and promptly reported this to the team leader. An investigation was conducted in the warehouse and among other captains to determine if these orders were misplaced during dispatch; however, they remained unaccounted for until the next day. When loading the vehicle the following day, a small hole was discovered below the door handle, raising suspicions that a theft had indeed taken place by unlocking the side door handle in a professional manner, without leaving much visible traces.

 

A police complaint has been filed, but due to staff unavailability yesterday because of Eid, the captain is scheduled to meet with them today at 3:30 PM. We will send you the police report as soon as the procedure is completed.

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

 

*	Assigned orders Run sheet(Route Alrai)
*	Customer invoice with value
*	Missing order summary as per below
*	Muse & HD missing order email to Store
*	Poilce report(Will be sent after completion)

Subject: Order Misplaced 

 

Dear Team,

 

I hope this message finds you well. 

 

I would like to inform you that the orders listed below has been misplaced during delivery by our delivery captain. We are currently investigating the situation regarding the missing order. In the meantime, please proceed to create a new order for the customer so that we can ensure timely delivery.

 

MFKW00003101 and LOKW00206623

 

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

 

Best regards,

Subject: Orders theft from vehicle

 

Dear Hagop

 

Hope you are doing well.

 

Further to our conversation on Teams, please find attached details of the missing 4 orders. As reported by the delivery Captain, the incident of theft has most likely occurred in the Al Rai Kuwait area between 3 PM and 3:45 PM on 29th March 2025, where he parked the vehicle in a crowded area, specifically at the Kuwait Friday market, to deliver an order to a customer.

Further to our conversation on Teams, please find attached details of the missing 4 orders. As reported by the delivery Captain, the incident of theft has most likely occurred in the Al Rai Kuwait area between 3 PM and 3:45 PM on 29th March 2025, where he parked the vehicle in a crowded area, specifically at the Kuwait Friday market, to deliver an order to a customer.

 

During his next stop, he noticed that four orders were missing and promptly reported this to the team leader. An investigation was conducted in the warehouse and among other captains to determine if these orders were misplaced during dispatch; however, they remained unaccounted for until the next day. When loading the vehicle the following day, a small hole was discovered below the door handle, raising suspicions that a theft had indeed taken place by unlocking the side door handle in a professional manner, without leaving much visible traces.

 

A police complaint has been filed, but due to staff unavailability yesterday because of Eid, the captain is scheduled to meet with them today at 3:30 PM. We will send you the police report as soon as the procedure is completed.

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter.
